name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrowseWiz - Your AI Chat Assistant with ChatGPT, Gemini

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase your productivity: learn faster and automate your in-browser workflows with powerful AI models in side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with BrowseWiz - the ultimate AI copilot that puts multiple powerful LLM models at your fingertips! With a simple Alt+B shortcut, unlock instant AI assistance for reading, writing, and data processing. Whether you're browsing web pages, watching YouTube videos, or working with files, BrowseWiz is your smart companion! :)

With Promptbook you can save your prompts for repeated use and turn them into templates.

Join our Discord community to learn how to enhance your life and workflow with AI through: https://discord.gg/qnfbYgzuQf
We are building community-driven AI assistant - new feature suggestions are very welcome!

âœ“ Context-aware conversations based on active tab, selected text, or files

âœ“ Universal chat capability for any topic or task

ğŸ” Smart Web Navigation

âœ“ Intelligent webpage comprehension with clickable references

âœ“ Interactive text highlighting for easy information location

âœ“ Context-based Q&A with precise page section citations

âœ“ YouTube video summaries based on transcript

ğŸ“º YouTube Enhancement

âœ“ Instant video transcript summarization

âœ“ Perfect for educational content, tutorials, podcasts

âœ“ Quick knowledge extraction from video content

ğŸ“ Multi-File Intelligence

âœ“ Simultaneous file analysis and comparison

âœ“ Cross-document information retrieval

âœ“ Unified content processing

ğŸ’» Advanced Data Processing

âœ“ Rich prompt library for automated data handling

âœ“ Multiple format conversions (JSON, CSV, Markdown, XML)

âœ“ Streamlined data extraction and transformation

ğŸ“ Content Creation Assistant

âœ“ Smart email response generation

âœ“ Social media post crafting

âœ“ Professional content writing (blogs, essays, articles)

Experience the future of browsing with BrowseWiz - your AI-powered productivity companion! (^_^)
